lyrics:
7 contributorssay a prayer for me lyricsverse 1
say a prayer for me
let my body sleep tonight
you were there for me girl
standing by my side
turn the page for me
i’ll see you on the other side
know that there’s a place for me girl
alright

chorus
say a prayer for me
would you do it i could use it
say goodbye for me
im moving alright
say a prayer for me
would you do it i could use it
say goodbye for me
it’s time alright

verse 2
say a prayer for me
give me love and peace of mind
leave me gracefully girl
i pay my debts tonight
time has come for you
to place your hand in mine
know that there’s a place for me girl
alright
see rüfüs du sol liveget tickets as low as 93you might also likebridge
ill take you further
ill take you further down tonight
ill take you further further
ill take you further
ill take you further down tonight
ill take you further further
ill take you further
ill take you further down tonight
ill take you further further

chorus
say a prayer for me
would you do it i could use it
say goodbye for me
im moving alright
say a prayer for me
would you do it i could use it
say goodbye for me
it’s time alrightembed
